Did you take a look at http://junit.sourceforge.net/#Developer ?

toalexsmail wrote:
> I have some ideas of little improvements of JUnit. See, topics "Filter
> improvement", "TextListener improvement", "FailedBefore exception",
> "Parameterized and Theories overlaps", "@Test improvement",
> "Parameterized improvement", "Failurs, Exception and AssertionError".
> I want to know:
> 
> - how decision is make what change should be checked in? Does any
> submitter can simply submit what he think is good? Does discussion
> here is enough?
> - if I have a little code improvements that doesn't affects the
> contract of the methods can I just make them?
> - how can I become submitter? What source version control system is
> used? How can I connect to it? In common, how can I do it? 
>
